contextDocuments.summary: 1930s French village, Studio Ghibli watercolor style, warm earth tones

narrative.text: When your prompts are scattered and your agents don't connect.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelAttributes.defaultSetting: Floating scattered prompt windows glowing faintly in darkness, representing disorganized AI workflow.
beatLevelAttributes.defaultAmbiance: Cool digital glow, dark contrast, cinematic focus.

visualConcepts.description: Close-up: prompt windows drift past camera, subtle depth of field.

attributes.setting: Floating scattered prompt windows glowing faintly in darkness, representing disorganized AI workflow.
attributes.ambiance: Cool digital glow, dark contrast, cinematic focus.
attributes.shotDescription: Close-up: prompt windows drift past camera, subtle depth of field.

variations.label: close-up
variations.imagePrompt: create image in 16:9 widescreen format: floating scattered prompt windows glowing faintly in darkness, cinematic lighting, digital workspace chaos, dark neutral background.

animations.prompt: animate with smooth folding transition from scattered prompts to connected grid, subtle parallax motion, cinematic reveal.

variations.label: wide
variations.imagePrompt: create image in 16:9 widescreen format: wide shot of multiple AI prompt windows floating in space, cool blue tones, minimal clean cinematic look.

animations.prompt: animate with drifting motion of glowing prompts, folding inward to align, gentle depth of field shift.

narrative.text: When your workflow feels like chaos, maybe you need more than another tool.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelAttributes.defaultSetting: Icons and code fragments connect to form the AppyDave logo, signifying harmony and structure.
beatLevelAttributes.defaultAmbiance: Warm gold highlights, clean branding light.

visualConcepts.description: Close-up: luminous particles linking to shape lines of the logo.

attributes.setting: Icons and code fragments connect to form the AppyDave logo, signifying harmony and structure.
attributes.ambiance: Warm gold highlights, clean branding light.
attributes.shotDescription: Close-up: luminous particles linking to shape lines of the logo.

variations.label: close-up
variations.imagePrompt: create image in 16:9 widescreen format: close-up of luminous particles connecting to form AppyDave logo, cinematic glow, gold accents.

animations.prompt: animate logo formation from luminous particles, fold and connect lines, glow intensifies then stabilizes.

variations.label: wide
variations.imagePrompt: create image in 16:9 widescreen format: wide shot of logo formation, soft golden light, clean background, elegant branding tone.

animations.prompt: animate slow zoom out as logo forms fully, soft fade-in of tagline, elegant rhythm.

narrative.text: Subscribe to AppyDave on YouTube. Join the Skool community.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelAttributes.defaultSetting: AppyDave end card on dark charcoal platform, glowing logo and beige tagline beneath.

visualConcepts.description: Close-up: logo surface glowing subtly, crisp branding focus.

attributes.setting: AppyDave end card on dark charcoal platform, glowing logo and beige tagline beneath.
attributes.shotDescription: Close-up: logo surface glowing subtly, crisp branding focus.
